![](tableau_workbook_analyzer.gif)

If you are a Tableau user/ developer you may have found yourself in a situation where you need or would like to extract all formulas at once from calculated fields to later find out there is no simple way to do so. `` [`<svg aria-label="Video" role="img" viewBox="0 0 576 512" style="height:1em;width:1.12em;vertical-align:-0.125em;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;font-size:inherit;fill:#64605F;overflow:visible;position:relative;"><title>Video</title><path d="M384 112v288c0 26.51-21.49 48-48 48h-288c-26.51 0-48-21.49-48-48v-288c0-26.51 21.49-48 48-48h288C362.5 64 384 85.49 384 112zM576 127.5v256.9c0 25.5-29.17 40.39-50.39 25.79L416 334.7V177.3l109.6-75.56C546.9 87.13 576 102.1 576 127.5z"/></svg>`{=html} here] ``
